page.title: 08TRELLECH'S NEW SCHOOL.
page.content: ON FRIDAY JULY 5TH. IN THE MONMOUTH BEACON IT WAS ANNOUNCED THAT THE PLAN FOR THE NEW SCHOOL AT TRELLECH HAD BEEN PASSED. THE NEW SCHOOL WILL HAVE A JUNIOR AND INFANTS LIBRARY, CHANGING ROOMS, COVERED WORKAREA AND A HALL. TRELLECH NEW SCHOOL WILL REPLACE PENALT, THE NARTH, CATBROOK, LLANISHEN AND TRELLECH OLD SCHOOL. THE NEW SCHOOL IS OPENING IN SEPTEMBER 1987, BECAUSE THE OLD SCHOOL HAS NOT GOT THE FACILITIES LIKE INDOOR TOILETS,ONLY TWO TEACHERS PER SCHOOL, AND NO PROPER HALL. THERE IS OF COURSE ANOTHER VIEW, AND SOME PEOPLE IN THR OTHER VILLAGES ARE ANGRY BECAUSE THEY DO NOT WANT THEIR LITTLE CHILDREN TO GO ON BUSES,AND THEY WANT TO KEEP THEIR OWN SMALL VILLAGE SCHOOLS.
